humidityLow.title: Humidity Low Alarm
humidityLow.description: Indicates if the humidity is below the threshold

humidityHigh.title: Humidity High Alarm
humidityHigh.description: Indicates if the humidity is above the threshold

temperatureLow.title: Temperature Low Alarm
temperatureLow.description: Indicates if the temperature is below the threshold

temperatureHigh.title: Temperature High Alarm
temperatureHigh.description: Indicates if the temperature is above the threshold
